page.title: 02Housing in Darenth
page.content:
The houses in our area are 80% semi-detached, 15% terraced and 5% detached. There are three sets of terraced cottages. We know that one set of cottages was built in 1906. In Coombfield Drive there are about 200 houses and in Hillrise there are 143 houses. There are about 100 bungalows in the area. Now about a third of the Council houses have been bought by their occupiers.
There is a block of flats which is a three storey unit. There are 5 two storey blocks for Old Age Pensioners.
Along the main road there is a house which used to be called "Sheffields". When it was called "Sheffields" it was a sweet shop. Now it isn't a sweet shop. It is now a fruit and vegetable shop. CONT.
